results.content: No. The instructor may 'know his stuff', however - he does not know how to 'present' it at all. The lectures are short with too much 'hello again'; 'see you'; and 'goodbye' - which is beyond annoying. The instructor also 'assumes' too much regarding what the student may/may not already know... I'll continue to see if I can learn anything at all - since I've already spent the money on this a long time ago - but I cannot, in good conscience - recommend this course to anyone else.

results.content: I thought I was in for a treat with this course, but WOW, this person has ZERO idea on how to teach. There was no explanation for anything, just a watch and copy. This is NOT how you teach anything, except maybe primal knowledge. Not to mention I could barely understand a word he was speaking. Too late to request a refund, so I am stuck with this worthless class.
